newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Samsung Elec completes Vietnam TV plant.
newsitem.headline: Samsung Elec completes Vietnam TV plant.

text.p: Samsung Electronics Co Ltd, flagship unit of South Korea's Samsung Group, said on Thursday it had completed a colour television plant near Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

The plant, with an annual capacity of 250,000 units, is owned by Samsung VINA Electronics Co Ltd, a 70-30 joint venture between Samsung and Trade Import Export Co of Vietnam, a statement from Samsung said.
It said the plant's annual production was expected to be doubled by the year 2000. Samsung Electronics has invested $43 million in the venture. --Seoul Newsroom (822) 727 5645
